page.title: 20Credits
page.content: The bulk of the work on this Domesday Project was done by the fourth years at Dunston St.Peters School.We are all very grateful for the help given by Mr.Ellis,manager of Nocton Farms.We are also very grateful to Mr.Hall from the Parish Council for his help in the project.The fourth years have worked extremely hard to find all the information about Dunston and other small villages around. Fourth year Juniors from Dunston involved with the Domesday Project are: Duncan Attwood,Richard Wingad, David Guild,Anthony Honeyball, James Thorpe,Mark Bland,Grant Ticker, Nathan Chappell,Jennifer McLuckie, Michelle Bannister,Louisa Costello and Jacqueline Hall.
